definition: any igniter that is used to initiate the burning of a propellant, mix together different elements
details:
noun
- any igniter that is used to initiate the burning of a propellant
= synonyms: priming
- an electrical device that can interrupt the flow of electrical current when it is overloaded
= synonyms: electrical fuse
verb
- mix together different elements
= synonyms: flux
- make liquid or plastic by heating
= example: make liquid or plastic by heating
- become plastic or fluid or liquefied from heat
= example: become plastic or fluid or liquefied from heat
- equip with a fuse
= example: equip with a fuse
